   20: %%
   21: 
   22: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   23: %%%                                                             %%%
   24: %%%                       WARNING                               %%%
   25: %%%                                                             %%%
   26: %%% This is experimental code which may be changed or removed   %%%
   27: %%%               anytime without any warning.                  %%%
   28: %%%                                                             %%%
   29: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   30: 
   31: -module(hash_property_test_SUITE).
   32: 
   33: -export([suite/0,all/0,groups/0,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   35:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   36:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
   37: 
   38: -export([test_phash2_no_diff/1,
   39:          test_phash2_no_diff_long/1,
   40:          test_phash2_no_diff_between_versions/1]).
   41: 
   42: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   43: 
   44: suite() ->
   45:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   46: 
   47: all() -> [{group, proper}].
   48: 
   49: groups() ->
   50:     [{proper, [], [test_phash2_no_diff,
   51:                    test_phash2_no_diff_long,
   52:                    test_phash2_no_diff_between_versions]}].
   53: 
   54: 
   55: %%% First prepare Config and compile the property tests for the found tool:
   56: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   57:     ct_property_test:init_per_suite(Config).
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: %%% Only proper is supported
   63: init_per_group(proper, Config) ->
   64:     case proplists:get_value(property_test_tool,Config) of
   65: 	proper -> Config;
   66: 	X -> {skip, lists:concat([X," is not supported"])}
   67:     end;
   68: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   69:     Config.
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   77:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
   78: 
   79: test_phash2_no_diff(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   80:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(
   81:              phash2_properties:prop_phash2_same_with_same_input(),
   82:              Config).
   83: 
   84: test_phash2_no_diff_long(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   85:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(
   86:              phash2_properties:prop_phash2_same_with_same_long_input(),
   87:              Config).
   88: 
   89: test_phash2_no_diff_between_versions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   90:     R = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2) ++ "_latest",
   91:     case ?CT_PEER_REL([], R, proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
   92:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
   93:             true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(
   94:                      phash2_properties:prop_phash2_same_in_different_versions(Node),
   95:                      Config),
   96:             true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(
   97:                      phash2_properties:prop_phash2_same_in_different_versions_with_long_input(Node),
   98:                      Config),
   99:             peer:stop(Peer);
  100:         not_available ->
  101:             {skip, io_lib:format("Release ~s not available~n", [R])}
  102:     end.
